2004-08-25

Another few things about last night


Picture from here

  • It's reasssuring that no matter what loungy / jazzy / dancy / krautrocky / poppy / droney / sharp / smooth* racket Stereolab are making Tim will still be there towards the back of the stage strumming and shaking his head from side to side.
  • Laetitia never touched a keyboard all night and played various bits of percussion AND a trombone
  • There was a definite correlation between how much I enjoyed a song and how little of the trombone, french horn and/or bugle turned up on it.


* Delete as appropriate.
